title: BIO-RAD 16K Centrifuge For Sale
text:
Seller assumes all responsibility for this listing..
Listing: #4918342
Comes with everything you see in pictures; except for the stand (if pictured; Stand not included in shipping cost unless specified).
You will get nothing more or less. If it isn't in the pictures and is not specified here don't assume you will be getting it.
You'll get only those accessories which are in the pictures, if there are no pictures of accessories then you'll not get accessories
For the power cord, if you can see a separate picture of power cord then you'll get it otherwise we used power cord to test the item. (For availability, Please contact us)
Shipping cost includes only the shipping and handling costs of the item & any other accessories that may be shown in the pictures for this item. For items with stands, please read here.
Items with Stand
Please note, the item will only be shipped after cleared/confirmed funds are received.Item Location This item is shipping from NC Warehouse zip code 28621 . Expedited Shipping If you need expedited shipping, Please give us a call or leave us a message before making the payment.
If item is not as described return for complete refund (minus the Shipping and Handling charges).
If you return it just because you made a mistake or you no longer want it. A 20% restocking fee and shipping and handling fees will be charged. buyly if you are interested in buying it.
THIS EQUIPMENT IS OFFERED WITH OUR AS-REPRESENTED GUARANTEE: For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this sale description, or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of buyprice.
Please note: THAT WE DO NOT REFUND SHIPPING CHARGES. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email within 4 calendar days of delivery to make arrangements for return of equipment & prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).Payment:
All kinds of Credit Cards and Electronic Checks are accepted through PayPal.Sales Tax: Buyers from Maryland, Minnesota and North Carolina are charged sales tax according to following rates. Please note all local pickups are also subject to sales tax.
"The sale of this item may be subject to regulation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If so, do not buy this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, we will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item."
Company: .
Address: Bloomington, MN
Item has been cleaned and handled in accordance with the manufacturers instructions
If you have questions about legal obligations regarding sales of medical devices, you should consult with the FDA's Center for Devices and Radiological Health:
This item is as seen in pictures but the seller assumes no responsibility for the proper or improper use of the product. If the item is to be used in conjunction with patient care and/or diagnosis it is responsibility of the buyer to get proper certifications/licenses for the use of the item. It would be highly recommended and wise to have a bio-med completely check the product for its performance and safety parameters before actual use for patient care and/or diagnosis.
If you have any doubts regarding the purchase of this product please feel free to contact us via and we will be more than happy to answer your questions.
